# <a name="print-email-and-calendars-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="49755-102">E-mail en agenda's in Outlook.com afdrukken</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="49755-102">Print email and calendars in Outlook.com</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="49755-103">Een e-mailbericht afdrukken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="49755-103">To print an email message:</span></span>
  
1. <span data-ttu-id="49755-104">Selecteer het bericht dat u wilt afdrukken.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="49755-104">Select the message you want to print.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="49755-105">Selecteer de drie puntjes in de rechterbovenhoek van het bericht.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="49755-105">At the top right corner of the message, select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="49755-106">en selecteert u vervolgens</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="49755-106">and then select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="49755-107">**Af te drukken**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="49755-107">**Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="49755-108">Uw agenda afdrukken:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="49755-108">To print your calendar:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="49755-109">Selecteer in de rechterbovenhoek van de pagina</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="49755-109">At the top right corner of the page, select</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="49755-110">**Af te drukken**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="49755-110">**Print**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="49755-111">Kies de weergave en het tijdsbereik en selecteer **afdrukken**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="49755-111">Choose the view and time range, and select **Print**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="49755-112">Meer informatie over het [afdrukken van e-mailberichten en agenda's in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="49755-112">Learn more about how to [print email and calendars in Outlook.com](https://support.office.com/article/c835b8e5-b310-4cab-ac15-b6eb95149855?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
